titles.title: Employing America's Heroes Tax Relief Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the employer wage credit for employees who are active duty members of the uniformed services.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/14/2009--Introduced. Employing America's Heroes Tax Relief Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2010 the tax credit for differential wage payments made by a small business employer on behalf of employees who are active duty members of the uniformed services.
